biotools.summary: Set of Python tools for maximum parsimony phylogenetic event-based tree reconciliation in undated trees using the DTL (duplication-loss-transfer) model with applications to gene trees and species trees; parasite trees and host trees; and species trees and area cladograms.

bioschemas.name: Xscape
bioschemas.summary: Set of Python tools for maximum parsimony phylogenetic event-based tree reconciliation in undated trees using the DTL (duplication-loss-transfer) model with applications to gene trees and species trees; parasite trees and host trees; and species trees and area cladograms.
